name: X-Files
description: X-Files, bred by Pheno-Type Seeds, is a hybrid strain that crosses Sour Diesel, Mask, and the pure indica Purple Drank. It inherits a strong tangy flavor with buds that grow dense like its Sour Diesel parent.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Aroused, Nausea, Stress, Cramps, Pain, Depression, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
